name: Toby, The Secrect Agent Who Has to Privatly Send Classified Information to His Base
name_original: Toby, The Secrect Agent Who Has to Privatly Send Classified Information to His Base
description:
You're a special agent infiltrated into an evil organization. You have important information to send in order to notify the agency. But you must be careful: the enemy must not intercept your message.

Developed for the 2018 Global Game Jam (theme: Transmission)

Credits: 
Rafael Lucio de Mattos and Vladmir Chicarolli de Souza

Morse 30 wps SFX by evelazquez https://freesound.org/s/329882/
Spy Music by Alvinwhatup2 https://freesound.org/s/389552/
